memories.content: User requested comprehensive commit message and README.md creation for storage-management-solution project
memories.context: User wants both git commit and documentation created

memories.content: Starting research on storage-management-solution project. Need to understand project structure, technology stack, features, and dependencies to provide comprehensive summary.

Project Analysis Complete: Storage Management Solution is a modern file storage and management platform. Built with Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, and Appwrite backend. Features include user authentication, file upload/management, storage analytics, and responsive design with ShadCN UI components. Uses TailwindCSS for styling and React Hook Form with Zod for validation. Project structure follows Next.js 13+ app directory pattern with proper authentication routing.

Completed comprehensive commit message and README.md creation for storage-management-solution project. Created detailed commit for gitignore changes and comprehensive README with project overview, features, tech stack, setup instructions, and architecture details.
memories.context: Tasks completed successfully with proper documentation and git commit

memories.content: Starting comprehensive authentication audit for storage-management-solution project. User wants to find all auth-related files, routes, components, middleware, error handling, env vars, and database models.

Auth system structure found:
- Sign-in page: /src/app/(auth)/sign-in/page.tsx - simple wrapper for AuthForm
- AuthForm component: /src/components/forms/AuthForm.tsx - handles both sign-in/sign-up, shows error messages
- User actions: /src/lib/actions/user.actions.ts - contains loginUser function using Appwrite
- Error shows in AuthForm at line 148-150, error state set at line 75
- loginUser function deletes existing session then creates new one
- Uses Appwrite for authentication backend
